Text: If you do a search, you'll find that someone has already uploaded S01E01.

This show is absolutely ruined by the host. seriously, this show could be really good..but is absolutely destroyed by the host joan rivers. she keeps jumping in the screen every couple minutes showing off her awful plastic-surgery distorted face and making totally mis-placed comments about sex. i never complain but this is the biggest f*ck up ever done to a potentially cool TV show.
